import { Link, useParams } from "react-router-dom"; import json from "../users.json"; const Ateliers = () => { const { id } = useParams(); let userData = null; for (let i = 0; i < json.length; i++) { if (json[i]["id"] == id) { userData = json[i]; break; } } return (

{userData.name + " " + userData.lastName}
